body:
Comment 2 by **sarun101**: 
Yes
Actually that is exactly like the first working version I wrote.
(Some trivial: You forgot to rename ubuff)
but in go I just feel like that will make intention of the variable more vague (without
a comment).

This kind of question may arise:
Why pass only the first parameter of Crawl why not 4? ("waiter" included)
Why u is in the argument list in the first place why not clean it up?

And the code will probably got cleanup to buggy version by someone else.
